title: Great Grandmother
creator_credit: John Taylor, ONF | NFB and Lorna Rasmussen
brief_description: This film presents four women, still living, who represent the social position of women in the early wast. Their stores are combined with stills, archival footage, material from publications of the time, diaries, and personal papers. The film was shot in some of the ‘living museums’ of Alberta.
